channel.title: ClashX ChangeLog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• update core to latest dev(premium)
  • try reduce the time of turning tun off
Fri, 12 Jun 2020 15:05:25 GMTVersion 1.20.3 (1.20.3)
  • Fix iCloud related issue.
  • Update clash core
Fri, 05 Jun 2020 13:01:10 GMTVersion 1.20.3.3 (1.20.3.3)
  • Update core, support classic rule provider
  • Add a new auto interface detection mode to solve some problem in special network.
Wed, 10 Jun 2020 14:40:32 GMTVersion 1.20.3.1 (1.20.3.1)
  • Fix iCloud related issue.
  • Update clash core
Sat, 06 Jun 2020 05:49:52 GMTVersion 1.20.1.3 (1.20.1.3)
  • Update to latest clash core. add tolerance for url-test & domain trie support wildcard alias.
  • Persistence dashboard size
